brewery.brewery_description:
Since 1970, the village of Ecaussinnes had no own brewery. In 1999, Hugues and Isabel Van Poucke, decided to remedy this and started Ecaussinnes brewery in an old castle.
In 2012, the entire complex is sold to two investors aiming to boost production of beer. From there, a new dynamic started with the forming of a new young and motivated team. Substantive work is done to bring the productions and the image of the brewery up to date.

beer.beer_name: Les Vignerons des Fleurs - Florilège de Pensée

items.badge_description: Hazy and white like a winter storm, but best enjoyed on a warm sunny day. This specific style of wheat beer brings with it a subtle mix of spices and hops, giving it a distinct flavor with little bitterness. That's 40 different beers categorized as a Witbier. Try 5 more for Level 9!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 11 years on Untappd!
Total Beer Domination. We’re not worthy. That's over 200 different brews!

venue.venue_name: 广州白云国际会议中心越秀万豪酒店

location.venue_address: 6/F 37 Fuzhou Rd | 福州路37号船长酒店6搂

user.location: "If the beer is all I’m ever remembered 4, I consider myself the luckiest fella on Earth"

user.bio: Exploring the diverse world of beer one pint at a time. Cheers!

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 290 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 59!

items.checkin_comment: Jul '16. Bottled, 330ml as KVB Rose from Auchan Hypermarket, Louvroil, France

location.venue_address: 6/F 37 Fuzhou Rd | 福州路37号船长酒店6搂

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 210 distinct venues!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!

If your mash uses more than 50% wheat, you’ve got yourself a wheat beer. This diverse family includes goses, hefeweizens, American wheat ales, and more! That's 10 different beers in the "Wheat" category! Try 5 more for Level 3!

Whether you’re having a room party or hanging at the hotel bar, you know the essential part of any trip, an awesome beer!

That's a beer at 20 different venues categorized as a Hotel! Visit 5 more different ones for Level 5!

beer.beer_description: A Bière de Garde whose complex flavors improve with time. Its high alcohol content, 10%, gives it a warm back of mouth, but it remains light and tasty. Notes of coffee and slightly woody.
Not to be confused with "Ultra Blonde", which is a regular blonde. This beer has 8% ABV and a black and yellow label (black and green for the blonde).
Not to be confused with "Ultrablonde", which confusingly enough is a triple. This beer has 6% ABV and a black and green label (black and yellow for the tripel).

beer.beer_name: Les Vignerons des Fleurs - Florilège d'Hibiscus
beer.beer_description: Third of a series of five beers made with flowers.

In Pepingen rees het idee om een dorpsbier te brouwen en Hugues zette de Brasserie Ecaussines aan het werk. “Het is een blond biertje van 8% alcohol op basis van pure mout en Poperingse hop, waar we steranijs, gember, kruidnagel, koriander en sinaasappelschillen aan toevoegden”, verklapt Hugues.
